Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to enhance your daily experiences. Given its unique features and high-quality craftsmanship, I believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering its worth to me and the benefits it offers, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you for $100. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the value I see in delivering exceptional products to those who appreciate them. I hope you find this offer compelling and look forward to your consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $100. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $100
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
